page.title: 12West Swindon Shopping Centre
page.content: To serve the west Swindon community a the West Swindon Centre has been built including the Carrefour Hypermarket, 24 smaller shops and a pub called "The Harvester". The{restaurant}has over{6000 customers {every week,}with Thurs_Sat being the busiest time of week with 1500 customers each day. Modern equipment like a{Â£15000 dishwasher}makes life easier for the staff as do microwaves and convector ovens. In a survey of shops most said that the{Fri-Sat period}was the{busiest time with people shopping for the weekend. Outside there is extensive car parking a play area for children and an attempt has been made to landscape the area but the choice of building material, concrete block, is rather drab.
